pull.title: [0.12] Disable bad-chain alert
pull.body:
Continuous false positives will lead to them being ignored entirely.
Better to disable now until this can be fixed more thoroughly in the next release.

Discussed at 2016-03-31 IRC meeting.

Refs: #7568

events.message:
Disable bad chain alerts

Continuous false positives lead to them being ignored entirely
so it's better to disable now until this can be fixed more
thoroughly.

events.body: utACK but #7568 should be milestoned to 0.13 before this is merged.

comments.body: maybe add a comment why we outcomment that part for 0.12.x
